text: 9:28 Aisaia 53:12; Rom 6:10; Taitus 2:13; 1 Pita 2:24; 2 Pita 3:12; 1 Jon 3:5Kamaghɨra, Krais gumazir avɨribar arazir kurabar osɨmtɨziba aterasa, dughiar vamɨran ofan mɨn uabɨ isa God ganigha areme. Egh gɨn a dughiar namba 2ɨn ua izam, egh dughiar kamɨn an arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨsɨ izan kogham. Puvatɨ. A gumazir a mɨzua itiba guizbangɨra men akurvagh me iniam.
